name: Sky Bubble Island
description:
Oh no!
So many Lvl1 slime monsters.
Get your hammer out, now!

Thank you for playing!

----------------------

  • WASD / cursor keys, Click to hammer
  • ESC to pause

----------------------

Additional assets used:

- Terrain Tileset "Whispers of Avalon" by Crush / Leonard Pabin
(https://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-grassland-tileset)
- Font "Thaleah" by Tiny Worlds
(https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/39602)
- Music "Yet Another Journey" by Andrea Baroni, andreabaroni.com
(https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/963)

----------------------

Made for ZenoJam 2021 in 2 days.

Incomplete features due to submission deadline:

  • click to walk
  • more Hero upgrades
  • Defenses and their upgrades
  • agressive slime type
  • hammering animation
  • larger island
  • other islands

Have fun! :)
